title: Hermead
description: Hermead is an epic poem in blank verse about philosophers and scientists.Volume 1 contains the following episodes:Wisdom Of AthenaLyre Of HermesFire of PrometheusAlphabet Of KadmosHealing Of AsklepiosChaos Of Zethos Hesiodoshttp://facebook.com/Hermeadhttp://tinyurl.com/Hermead01
author: Surazeus Astarius
